title: Stories and news - Immune response - UF Health
cleaned_text: [ Studies: Inflammation-targeting antibody boosts preterm birth outcomes, prevents obesity-linked liver disease ](https://ufhealth.org/news/2023/studies-inflammation-targeting-antibody-boosts-preterm-birth-outcomes-prevents-obesity-linked-liver-disease) June 23, 2023 JUPITER, Fla. — Targeting a master-regulator of inflammation with a monoclonal antibody potentially improves two unrelated conditions with limited treatment options: preterm births and fatty liver disease, two new studies show. Mounting... The Herbert Wertheim UF Scripps Institute for Biomedical Innovation & Technology
